title: mrquackquack
author: mrquackquack
content: Hello we have a new project that is in need of project developers and helpers. Please post here if interested.Here is the the link to the projecthttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400324.msg60235219#msg60235219

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.created_time: May 27, 2022, 01:38:23 PMLast edit: May 29, 2022, 11:19:50 AM by BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Quoting your project's "key points":Quote from: mrquackquack on May 27, 2022, 01:20:16 PMThe main key points of this project will be cheap and fast money transfer with also the implementation of global energy exploration and worldwide commodity import and exportation.Quote from: mrquackquack on May 27, 2022, 01:32:29 PMHello we have a new project that is in need of project developers and helpers.Helpers? You mean investors? Why do you want people to fund you? Perhaps a little explanation besides some buzz-phrases like "cheap" and "fast money transfer" would be rightful.

comments.author: Jocuserious
comments.body: You should post services section then you will find out more people even if your project make trustful then good welcome. Anyway you can take developer here of your project but not like devs. If your project is newcomer then you should manage very strong community. All answer in service section so go and make a topic about your issue.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Your product is ready for sale and this is a marketing side so you need a section where you can attract interested and experienced people on the aspect you are looking for. However you should be ready to fund your project at least at this early stage before you can look for partnership. People won't want to invest or partner in what they have not seen the possibility, so source for your fund and take your thread to service board

comments.author: kryptocanon
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on May 27, 2022, 01:39:58 PMNo I mean helpersSo basically what you're asking here is people or solo individual to dash out funds or what? If your answer to that is yes then I guess you're totally in the wrong room. This isn't a charity bro, investors and community to drive-up your project are the best you can get here.
